Summary: it scared me really badly.. i thought when i did see one i wouldnt be scared.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was drivin home around 12, when i looked into the sky and saw a light and i didnt think anything of it i thought it was a plane untill i really looked and it wasnt movin just huvering there. it had random blinking white lights in a oval shape and a red one in the middle, that blinked. then behind the main one, there was two small triangles of white lights behind the main oval. then inbetween the pair of tringles a little behind is two red lights close together..it didnt move or anything i saw it four about 10min before it sunk in what it was so i drove home scared..lol. by the time i drove up the street to my house i couldnt see it any longer.
